name: Runaway Dreams
description:
Play as a member of the Dream Police, an ancient organization that manifested from both light and dark dream energy. This neutral group of dream entities exists to keep balance between light (good) dreams and dark (nightmares) dreams. The nightmares are obsessed with the power contained in rare elements, called Dream Crystals, that are meant to be shattered in order to gain access to the real world. Fight as a member of the Dream Police against the waves of nightmares and defend the Crystals at all cost.

Build 001 - 1/24/2023 (Wave Mode Test)
